00010 // Dictionary keys used in BkmmFileProperties dictionaries 
00011 // which are used in more than one Extore subclass
00012 // Subclasses may add their own.

00157 /*
00158  @brief   An in-memory managed object context used to hold Starks
00159  structured for the external store during ixternalizations.
00160 
00161  @detail  If the instance variable exterMOC is nil, a
00162  new managed object context is created and immediately
00163  loaded by reading from the external store.
00164  
00165  The container structure of the items in the moc is
00166  that of the external store.
00167  */
00168 @property (retain, readonly) NSManagedObjectContext*  exterMOC ;
00169 
00170 /*
00171  @brief   A sqlite managed object context used to hold Starks
00172  which mirror those in a not-always-accessible external store.
00173 
00174  @detail  This is used by stores such as ExtoreDelicious whose
00175  external store is not always available, and/or whose API
00176  requires that we keep a local copy.
00177  
00178  This moc thus holds items only permanently, and therefore
00179  it uses an sqlite store on the hard drive provided by 
00180  SSYMOCManager. 
00181  */
00182 @property (retain, readonly) NSManagedObjectContext*  localMOC ;
00183 
00184 /*
00185  @brief   A wrapper around localMOC. 
00186  */
00187 @property (retain, readonly) Starker*  localStarker ;
00188 
00189 /*
00190  @brief   A wrapper around exterMOC
00191  */
00192 @property (retain, readonly) Starker* starker ;
